about_the_game:
Curse of Elmwood: Plunge into the darkness of an old mansion
You stand on the threshold of the Elmwood Mansion. A cold wind blows through the bare branches of the trees, hitting your face and reminding you of the approaching night. The high walls of the mansion seem formidable and impregnable, and deep within them lie secrets that don't want to be revealed. Legends of Elmwood's curse walk the edge of the woods, and locals whisper about the ghosts that roam its corridors. But you don't believe in mysticism, you just want to tickle your nerves. You decide to spend the night in this old house to see if the legends are true.
You enter the hall. The heavy air is saturated with the smell of dust and damp. Portraits of the mansion's previous owners stare at you with cold indifference. You hear quiet whispers from deep inside the house, but no one sees. You begin to feel that you are not alone in this house.
Curse of Elmwood is an atmospheric horror where you find yourself trapped in a gloomy 18th century mansion, steeped in mystery and horror.
Story:
You're intrigued by the legends of the cursed Elmwood Mansion, you decide to spend the night within its empty walls. But this night will be the most terrifying night of your life. The house holds secrets of the Elmwood family that don't want to be revealed. You find notes, diaries, and photographs that tell the story of how a dark force devoured life in this house. You learn about love and hate, happiness and fear, and the curse that bound the Elmwood family's life to this house.
You'll meet the ghosts of the past who haunt you, whispering threats and trying to take your soul. You'll hear their cries in the nursery, see their madness in the mirrors, feel their coldness in your bones.
Game Features:
Horror atmosphere: Gloomy graphics, sounds of ticking clocks, whispering ghosts and mysterious silhouettes in the shadows will create a unique atmosphere of fear.
Unraveling the mystery: You will be searching for the key that will help you to unlock the mystery of Elmwood's curse and free the souls from captivity.
Puzzles: Solve riddles, look for clues, use objects and unlock the secrets of the mansion.
Curse of Elmwood is a game for those who love atmospheric horror games with riddles and exciting plot. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in the dark corridors of Elmwood!

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
